text:
Windows Start Button -> Apache HTTP Server 2.2 -> Control Apache Server -> Restart

"C:\Program Files\Apache Software Foundation\Apache2.2\bin\httpd.exe" -w -n "Apache2.2" -k restart

Restart button only stops the server ...and do not start it.
creator: bugzilla33@gmail.com

text: Tested on two other machines with Windows 7 and Apache 2.2.17.
creator: bugzilla33@gmail.com
